name: HardeningEasy
short_description:
This is a project to announce the creation of toolkit for hardening resources of Linux and windows. Hardening is now running code, and I would like share my medicine to resolve your problemd to automate hardening of Linux and Windows.


Features:
 - Automate hardening of resources linux and windows by using textfiles for customize the operational environment to be protected.
- Write a graphic user interface for help automate tasks of hardening of resources

Requirementes
- Python 2.5 or higher
-Maybe knowledge in GTK/C, PyGtk,  or Java/swing;
- Desires for learning new skills :-)

Programmers, systems administators and friend users , I  will be happy to collaboration your !!!
Sinceraly,
Francisco Carlos
summary: hardening of  windows and linux environment.
